programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Ghosts in the Machine: Three tales of everyday objects that are haunted by the dead, including the story of a man who is attacked in bed by an invisible force. (S3, ep 6)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Crater Lake National Park: This tourist hotspot is also rumoured to be the epicentre of dark and sinister forces from Native American lore that lure visitors to their deaths. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Canyonlands National Park: A demonic truck driver, disembodied voices, nightmarish skinwalkers and a time loop are all reported to exist in Canyonlands National Park. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: UFOs over LA: February 1942, and the sky over Los Angeles erupts as anti-aircraft guns begin firing on strange targets. Could this have been an extraterrestrial raid? (1 of 6)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Airborne Attack: Anthrax is the most feared of all biological weapons, so when spores were found inside a letter sent through US mail in 2001, an entire nation was terrified. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: Mega Disasters 3
programme.desc: Deadly Jet Collision: Explore the events surrounding one of the worst aviation disasters in history, when 71 people died after two 747 cargo jets collided. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal

programme.desc: Henry and Allen Millyard find and restore a legendary Triumph Trident bike before heading out for the historic Prescott Hill Climb. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.desc: Gold Hustle: Les goes over the edge when Ashley's bad attitude loses the shop a big customer. (S3, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Sibling War: Tensions in the store threaten to boil over as Seth and Ashley clash once again. (S3, ep 9)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn

programme.title: PL: United v Arsenal 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 25/2/01. United welcomed Arsenal knowing that victory would move them closer to securing a third consecutive Premiership crown.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 07/08

programme.title: PL: Bolton v United 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 10/9/11. United enjoyed a stellar start to the 2011/12 season, underlined at The Reebok Stadium with a 5 star performance against Bolton.

programme.title: PL United v Southampton 01/02
programme.desc: United Archives 22/12/01. Sir Alex's side took on Southampton with the visitors looking for their first win at Old Trafford since January 1988.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 02/03
programme.desc: United Archives 23/11/02. Ruud Van Nistelrooy makes the headlines in this game full of goals.

programme.title: PL: Leicester v United 03/04

programme.title: PL: West Ham v United 10/11
programme.desc: United Archives 2/4/11. Wayne Rooney scores a second half hat-trick as United comeback to win at Upton Park in one of the games of the season.

programme.title: PL: United v Wigan 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 26/12/11. The Reds welcomed Wigan hoping to make it a Christmas to remember by recording a fifth straight Premier League win.

programme.title: PL: United v Norwich 12/13

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Balm Squad: The annual skip-a-thon fundraiser is taking place, and students are encouraged to take part to help raise money for charity and win a private all-expenses-paid pizza party! (S1, ep 11)

programme.desc: Lily starts misbehaving at home in 'Appetite for Destruction', then in 'Frame on You', when Rusty is wrongfully suspended, the Action News Team leaps into action to clear his name. (S5, ep 26)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln is on the hunt for his stolen birthday present in 'Present Danger', then in 'Stressed for the Part', after landing a role in a Dairyland production, Luan must hide the news! (S6, ep 1)

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.desc: Billy must save his astronaut hero in 'Crisis on Moonbase Momentous!', then in 'Wreckless Driving', Billy and Maddy must help Stunt Driver Wallop pass a safe driving course. (S4, ep 2)

programme.title: The Smurfs

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Dog Days: The Chipmunks take in a stray dog, but have to keep the puppy hidden from Dave, who won't allow pets. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Music Box: When the Principal's cat goes missing, Theodore gives her a music box he found to cheer her up. But when Dave discovers his Grandmother's music box is missing, he calls the police.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.desc: and Cat Noir: Sentibubbler: Shadow Moth creates Sentibubbler, a fearsome Sentimonster that will only stop if Rena Rouge betrays Ladybug and Cat Noir! Will our heroes pass this trust test? (S4 Ep14)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Fin-loose: The Mermicornos meet a community of fish who have banned dancing, but Nautique shakes things up by teaching a rebellious kid to dance. (S1 Ep111)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Book of Grim: To learn more about grim magic, Sophia, Ava and Layla sneak into the library after hours to borrow a restricted book that proves too powerful. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Sleeping Yeti: Yana eats a witch's apple and instantly falls asleep, so Felicity and Miguel have to find a way to break the spell. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: The Sand Crab Man: Felicity is having so much fun at her party, she convinces the Sand Crab Man to take the night off - which causes chaos in Mythlandia. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Under Water Pressure: The Mermicornos encounter a creature that plays on their anxieties. Meanwhile, Sawtooth attempts to drain the last fallen star. (S1 Ep112)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Hidden Temple: While riding the Skyberry Trail, Wildstar gets spooked by grim magic, sending the group racing to a long-forgotten temple full of mysteries - and danger. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Merry Mythmas - Part 1: When Santa Paws takes the year off, Felicity is chosen to replace him and deliver the Mythmas presents to all of Mythlandia. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Merry Mythmas - Part 2: Rudy teams up with Timmy the Kraken to try and ruin Mythmas, so it's up to Felicity and her friends to save the day. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: The All New All Different Power Players: The Power Players are captured by Ruffin the toy thief. Axel gathers a new team to free them. Will the new Power Players carry out their mission? (S1 Ep61)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Dancing with the Bears: Grizzy wants to learn to dance the mambo to please the she-bear he's in love with. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Role Change: After receiving a terrible blow over the head, Grizzy is no longer the same: he thinks he's a rodent! (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemming Tonic: Grizzy is exhausted and the couch has never seemed so enticing! He goes to fetch a pillow and a sleeping mask, but the lemmings have entirely different plans for the couch. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: It Takes Two To Talent: Felicity can't decide what to do for the Mythlandia Talent Contest, while Miguel channels his guitar skills. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Pot Luck: Felicity creates a rainbow, causing a leprechaun named Paddy to appear. When Paddy discovers there's no gold to guard, Felicity helps him find a new job. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Oren egnïol yn cyrraedd Gwlad y Lliwiau. Energetic Orange arrives in Colourland.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Y tro hwn yr Eliffant Asiaidd a'r Macac sy'n cael y sylw. This time we get to know the Asian Elephant and the Macaque.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Nel Gynffon-wen wedi mynd i chwilio am ei ffrind newydd, y Llyg. When Nel Gynffon-wen leaves the burrow in search of her new friend, Guto must find his sister before Hen Ben does.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Pan mae ei grys-T newydd yn cosi mae'n gwrthod gwisgo unrhyw ddillad! Pablo finds an itchy label in his T-shirt and decides not to get dressed!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Awn yn ol i'r flwyddyn 1804 i ddysgu am y trên stem cyntaf a gafodd ei ddefnyddio yng Nghymru, yn Merthyr Tudful. We return to 1804 to learn about the first ever steam train.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Mai-Mai yn colli llyfr lluniau arbennig Mabli ond all hi ddefnyddio camera Pip i ailosod y lluniau coll? On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are spring cleaning!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw byddwn yn clywed hanes ci ar goll yn Nhreorci. Cawn hefyd ddatgelu enillydd cystadleuaeth creu poster hawliau plant. We ask the public in Wales about children using mobile phones.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Ni ar y môr! Fflwff sy'n mwynhau mynd nôl a mlaen, Seren sy'n mwynhau mynd i fyny ac i lawr a'r Capten sy'n mynd rownd a rownd! Fflwff, Seren and the Captain have fun sailing on the sea!

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Wedi gwers natur yn yr ysgol yn trafod cuddliw, mae Stiw yn dychryn wrth weld unrhyw beth sydd â streipiau du a melyn. Stiw becomes scared of anything with yellow-and-black stripes.

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Cyw, Plwmp a Deryn wedi colli eu pêl tenis ac felly'n methu parhau â'u gêm. Cyw, Plwmp and Deryn have lost their tennis ball and so they can't continue their game. Can Jim help?

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: All Eira gadw Jêc draw o'r caban cyn iddo ddarganfod y parti syrpreis sydd wedi'i drefnu ar ei gyfer? Can Eira keep Jêc away from the cabin before he finds out about his surprise party?

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Huw a'r criw sy'n caslgu sbwriel ar un o draethau Ynys Môn, bydd Meia ac Elsa yn wyna ar eu fferm ger Aberystwyth, a Meleri sy'n ymweld â gardd go arbennig yng Nhydweli. Outdoorsy fun.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cân draddodiadol am forwr yn mynd ar daith yr holl ffordd i'r Eil o Man mewn padell ffrio! A traditional Welsh song about the singer's adventurous trip to the Isle of Man - in a frying pan!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod poeth iawn a mae'r tyrchod yn dioddef yn y gwres. It's a very hot day and the moles are suffering in the heat.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae Crugwen yn ymddeol ac mae Cadi a'r dreigiau yn trefnu parti ffarwelio syrpreis iddi. Crugwen is retiring and Cadi and the dragons are planning a surprise farewell party.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Giamocs yn dod lan hefo cynllun clyfar i'w chael hi a Chîff mewn i'r Crawcdy. Giamocs comes up with a cunning plan for herself and Chiff to be delivered as a parcel into Toad Hall.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddynt chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc. Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Coch a Glas yn cyfarfod ffrind newydd, Gwyrdd. Blue and Yellow meet a new friend - Green.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos the train and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon, cawn ddysgu mwy am y Morlo a'r Twcan. In this programme, we learn about the Seal and the Toucan.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae criw o lygod yn credu bod Benja yn arwr, ac yn gofyn iddo fynd i nôl eu pys sydd wedi cael eu dwyn. A band of mice mistake Benja for a hero and enlist him to retrieve their stolen peas.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y môr-ladron sy'n ymuno â Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Pan mae creision yn mynd i bobman mae'n rhaid i Pablo a'r anifeiliaid deithio i ben mynydd, i waelod y môr, ac i'r lleuad i'w cael nhw nôl. Pablo opens a packet of crisps too fast - uh-oh!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Ceir Cwl. Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am bopeth sy'n ymwneud â cheir, ac ewn i Unol Daleithiau America i ddysgu am Henry Ford. In this episode we'll learn about cars.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n cael cystadleuaeth cerdded mynydd. On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are having a mountain hiking competition!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Ar y Newffion heddiw byddwn ni'n clywed mwy am drychfilod ymhob rhan o Gymru. A beast has been seen roaming around Bala - this, and some more Welsh children's news in Newffion Ni.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Sgwrs dan y Lloer
programme.desc: Elin Fflur sy'n siarad gyda'r actor Richard Elfyn y tro hyn, i ddysgu mwy am ei fywyd personol a'i yrfa. This time, Elin Fflur chats to actor Richard Elfyn about his life and career. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Catrin Herbert a Cat Morris fydd yn westeion heno, i son am bodlediad Pob Lwc Babe. Catrin Herbert and Cat Morris will be our guests to talk about the Pob Lwc Babe podcast.

programme.title: Ty Am Ddim
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, dwy ferch ifanc sydd â'u bryd ar wneud elw drwy adnewyddu ty yng Nghlynderwen. This time, two young women are looking to make a profit by renovating a house in Clynderwen.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Iaith ar Daith
programme.desc: Y digrifwr o Majorca, Ignacio Lopez, sydd a'r her o ddysgu Cymraeg tro ma, efo help y comediwr Tudur Owen. Mallorcan comedian Ignacio Lopez learns Welsh with the help of comedian Tudur Owen.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Beth sy'n mynd i fyny?: Pan mae Barcud Mo yn mynd yn sownd ar ben tô swyddfa, mae'r Tîm yn gwybod sut i gadw eu traed ar y ddaear. Mo's kite gets stuck up on an office roof!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â sawl ci bach ac Enfys a'i moch cwta.Today we meet some cute puppies and Enfys and her guinea pigs.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Bela wrth ei bodd yn garddio ac yn falch tu hwnt o'i blodau lliwgar. Pan aiff rhai ar goll, mae'n gwybod pwy sydd ar fai - Anni! Bella's colourful flowers go missing - who's to blame?

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw teithiwn i Indonesia, gwlad sydd wedi'i gwneud o filoedd o ynysoedd ar gyfandir Asia. We learn about the Indonesian language, the capital city of Jakarta and food like Nasi Goreng.

programme.title: LEGO® DREAMZzz
programme.desc: Tra'n delio ag achos o ymlediad, mae'r cwsgarwyr yn mynd a dafad gorniog yn ôl i'r byd breuddwydion ac yn gweld rhywbeth tywyll. The dream chasers return a doom sheep to the dream world.

programme.title: Mabinogiogi a Mwy
programme.desc: Fersiwn criw Stwnsh o stori nawddsant cariadon Cymru - Santes Dwynwen. Dêts gwael, a mwy. Join the Stwnsh team for their version of the story of Dwynwen, Wales's patron saint of love.

programme.title: Digbi Draig

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pam bod mwncïod yn byw mewn coed'? yw cwestiwn Jamal i Tad-cu heddiw. Why do monkeys live in trees? Tad-cu has an absurd story, full o fun about two cheeky monkeys named Jess and Caleb.

programme.title: Twt

programme.title: Cacamwnci

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae Wini'n cyfarfod ag ystlumod mae hi eisiau chwarae â nhw, ond mae'r ystlumod yn hedfan i ffwrdd. O na! Wynona encounters some bats she wants to play with, but the bats fly away. Oh-no!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Siôn a'i ffrindiau'n ceisio eu gorau glas i guddio buwch rhag Magi. Siôn and his friends try their best to hide a surprise cow for Maggie.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tân a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tân and friends in the village.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Wrth i grwbanod môr newydd-anedig anelu am y cefnfor, mae'n rhaid i'r Octonots eu hamddiffyn rhag ysglyfaethwyr. As newborn baby sea turtles scuttle to the ocean they need help to stay safe.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae Harri yn cael galwad i ddweud bod cwch wedi torri yng Nglan Llyn. Yno hefyd mae Tomi wedi cicio pêl i'r llyn! Harri gets a call to say that a boat has broken down in Glan Llyn.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Enfys yn hwyr i bopeth heddiw ac yn benderfynol o ddod o hyd i ffordd o gyrraedd llefydd yn gyflymach! Rainbow is late and is determined to find a way of getting to places quickly.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae baromedr Abel yn dweud y bydd stormydd eira yn ardal Glenys o'r goedwig. Abel's barometer predicts snowstorms in Glenys's neck of the woods.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae pethau'n mynd o'i le i Bili Broga ar ôl iddo godi'r tŷ perffaith iddo'i hun ar lan y môr. Things go awry for Bili Frog after he builds the perfect beach house for himself.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae gan Ben air anarferol i'r Abadas heddiw ac maen nhw'n dysgu bod ganddo gysylltiad â dwr. A fun-filled adventure as the Abadas search for a new word which has some connection with water.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Thema'r rhaglen hon yw 'O Dan y Ddaear'. Today's theme is 'Under the Ground'.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn mynd i'r ysbyty i ddysgu sut mae doctoriaid a nyrsus yn edrych ar eich hôl pan 'da chi ddim yn teimo'n dda. The Tralalas look at the ways doctors and nurses care for you.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae yna gomed yn anelu am Ocido ac mae'n rhaid i Blero a'i ffrindiau ei rhwystro. Blero has to save Ocido from a falling comet and make sure that Mayor Oci has his bath as usual.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Hi! Welcome to a new series of Jamborî!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Rôl i dad fynnu penwythnos o wersylla di-sgrîn rhaid i'r Jet-lu wynebu Peredur Plagus a'r Cwerylod heb ddyfeisiadau. The Jet-lu face Peredur Plagus & the Cwerylod without their inventions!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Abel wrthi'n adeiladu pyramid o jariau jam yn ofalus ac mae gêm Digbi a Conyn bron â'u dymchwel. Digbi and Conyn's game nearly topples Abel's half-built pyramid of jam-jars.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu

programme.title: Twt

programme.desc: Mae Mario'n ceisio ei orau glas i gasglu cnau cyll ond mae gan y wiwer syniadau ei hun. Mario's efforts to forage for hazelnuts are thwarted by a mischievous squirrel.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn

programme.title: Fferm Fach

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin

programme.title: Live It Up
programme.desc: 1963. Featuring music from the likes of Kenny Ball, Gene Vincent and Heinz. A pop film classic from the golden era. Dave (David Hemmings) and his mates are GPO riders who dream of becoming stars. [S]

programme.title: Circumstantial Evidence (1952)
programme.desc: 1952. Crime. Director: Daniel Birt. Stars: Rona Anderson, Patrick Holt & John Arnatt. Cleverly crafted crime drama - A woman seeks evidence that will give her grounds for divorce. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life All in a Day's Work
programme.desc: 1969. A look at people who travel the world by air as part of their everyday jobs, including businessmen and women who fly around the world as easily as taking a taxi.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: Letter of the Law. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, R.G. Armstrong & Richard Hale. Bill rescues a man who is ambushed by gunmen and wounded by them, but no one wants to help him because he is a judge. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Help Unwanted. 1963. Stars David Kossoff, Derry Power & Norman Chappell. Complaints come in about the troublesome cleaning lady and Georgie's attempt to help creates a bigger mess. [S]

programme.title: Two on the Tiles
programme.desc: 1951. Comedy. Director John Guillermin. Stars Herbert Lom, Hugh McDermott & Brenda Bruce. A husband and wife are blackmailed by the butler on evidence of nights out until they combine to stop him. [S]

programme.title: Murder on Campus
programme.desc: 1961. Crime Drama. Directed by Michael Winner. Stars Terence Longden, Donald Gray and Diane Clare. A reporter learns that his brother, a student at Cambridge, has killed himself or so it seems. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of April and beginning of May. [S]

programme.title: No Trace
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Directed by John Gilling. Writer Robert Southley finds his lifestyle threatened by blackmail from a former US criminal associate. Stars Hugh Sinclair, Dinah Sheridan & John Laurie. [S]

programme.title: Night Train for Inverness
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Stars Norman Wooland, Jane Hylton & Dennis Waterman. An ex-convict kidnaps his son and takes him on a train to Inverness, unaware he is putting his son's life in danger. [S]

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: 1963. Western. Director: Andrew V. McLaglen. Stars John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara & Patrick Wayne. Wealthy rancher McLintock uses his power and influence to keep the peace between conflicting groups. [S]

programme.title: Campbell's Kingdom
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Directed by Ralph Thomas. Stars Dirk Bogarde, Stanley Baker, Michael Craig, Barbara Murray & John Laurie. A Canadian Rockies landowner leads the fight against a dam builder. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Elly Needs a Maw. 1963. Stars Donna Douglas, Doris Packer & Raymond Bailey. Jed plans to go home to look for a wife so Elly May can finally have a mother, but Mr. Drysdale has other plans. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1955. Night Plane to Amsterdam. Director: Ken Hughes. Stars Gerald Case, Shay Gorman, Selma Vas Dias & Andreas Malandrinos. The case of a murder which baffled the police of two countries. (S1, E11)

programme.title: Dixon of Dock Green
programme.desc: The Job. 1976. Stars Jack Warner, Ben Howard & George Innes. When a petty criminal is fished out of the river bound, gagged and barely conscious, the team must find out what happened and why. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Romney Marsh/Pumpkins. 1986. Jack looks back at a sunny visit to Kent when he tried to photograph a 'flying frog' on Romney Marsh, and he visits a village pumpkin fair. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We start with a trip to Durham's beaches in the 1960s and a look at the life of a sea coal man, we keep up with the fashions and products of 1949 and boogie with the 'The Avons' in 1962. [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: 1972. Detective & Mystery Drama. The Man Who Said Sorry. Stars Alfred Burke, Paul Rogers & Ray Smith. An oddly dressed man visits Marker, insisting he is the only man capable of helping him. [S]

programme.title: The Long Arm
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directed by Charles Frend. Stars Jack Hawkins, John Stratton, Dorothy Alison & Michael Brooke. The sleuths of Scotland Yard try to solve a series of burglaries. [S]

programme.title: Yield to the Night
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Director: J Lee Thompson. Stars Diana Dors, Yvonne Mitchell, Michael Craig & Geoffrey Keen. A condemned murderess relives key events while waiting for the hangman's noose. [S]

programme.title: Yield to the Night
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Director: J Lee Thompson. Stars Diana Dors, Yvonne Mitchell, Michael Craig & Geoffrey Keen. A condemned murderess relives key events while waiting for the hangman's noose. [S]

programme.title: The Siege of Sidney Street
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Directors: Monty Berman & Robert S. Baker. Stars Donald Sinden & Nicole Berger. As armed police surround a house in East London, a girl recalls the events that lead to the situation. [S]

programme.title: Police Dog
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Starring Joan Rice, Tim Turner & Sandra Dorne. When his colleague is shot dead by a burglar, PC Frank Mason vows for justice. After becoming a dog-handler, he finds a new partner. [S]

programme.title: Beyond The Truth
programme.desc: Alien Encounter. This documentary attempts to answer what was found in the woods in Virginia. (S1, E04)

programme.title: British Rails are Long and Fast
programme.desc: 1969. Directed by Bob Privett. Intended as a sales tool for manufacturers, this short film details the production, installation and maintenance for long welded track in use on British Railways.

programme.title: Danny Boy
programme.desc: 1941. Drama. A successful singer in America returns to Britain during the Blitz to find her ex-husband and son have fallen on hard times. Starring David Farrar and Ann Todd. [S]

programme.title: Variety Jubilee
programme.desc: 1943. Musical. Kit (Ellis Irving) and Joe Swann (Reginald Purdell) are variety stars. Kits' son is killed in the First World War but the grandson revives the music hall and joins the RAF musical. [S]

programme.title: Forbidden
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Directed by George King. Stars Douglass Montgomery, Hazel Court & Patricia Burke. An ex-serviceman plans to escape his faithless wife. [S]

programme.title: The Small Back Room
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Directors Michael Powell, Emeric Pressburger. Stars David Farrar, Jack Hawkins and Kathleen Byron. The best bomb disposal expert must battle his inner self, during the German raids. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Relax, Relax!
programme.desc: 1961. A light-hearted look at the various relaxation methods on offer to people.

programme.title: Commandos Strike at Dawn
programme.desc: 1942. War. Directed by John Farrow. Stars Anna Lee, Paul Muni & Ray Collins. A Norwegian fisherman, enraged at the Nazi atrocities against his village, sets out to seek revenge and restore peace. [S]

programme.title: An Inspector Calls
programme.desc: 1954. Crime. Director: Guy Hamilton. Stars Alastair Sim, Olga Lindo, Eileen Moore. The Birling family are rich and complacent. It is 1912, and the impending war has yet to fall across their lives. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of April and beginning of May. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Time to Remember. 1962. Directed by Charles Jarrott. Stars Yvonne Monlaur & Ernest Clark. Jack Burgess, a small-time estate agent, learns more about a deal from a mysterious caller. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: The Feathered Friend. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley, Peggy Ann Clifford & Otto Diamant. Scotland Yard call in Agent Tony Smith when a pigeon is discovered carrying diamonds in a canister on its leg. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Barbecued Batman? 1966. Stars Adam West, Van Johnson & Remo Pisani. Batman and Robin place a bugging device in Amanda's purse and discover The Minstrel's wicked plan. Can they stop him in time? [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Illegal Entry. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Walter Gotell & Adrienne Corri. Maguire gains insight into a recent wave of robberies after a man is arrested for skulking around on the roof of a shop. [S]

programme.title: Rumpole of the Bailey
programme.desc: Rumpole on Trial. Stars: Leo McKern, Marion Mathie, Robin Bailey. Rumpole is charged by Judge Oliphant with contempt of court and faces disbarment.

programme.title: Love for Lydia
programme.desc: Episode 12. 1977. Stars Mel Martin, Ralph Arliss & Irene Richard. Based on his publisher's advice, Richardson moves back to Evensford to continue writing but discovers that Lydia is hospitalised. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: A night of 80s horror awaits! Caroline Munro welcomes you into the Cellar Club to introduce the first film of the night, Visiting Hours. This 1982 feature stars Lee Grant and William Shatner. [S]

programme.title: Visiting Hours
programme.desc: 1982. Horror. Directed by Jean-Claude Lord. Stars Lee Grant, Michael Ironside & William Shatner. An investigative reporter becomes the next target of a deranged and misogynistic killer. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: We continue this night of terror with The Power. Caroline Munro introduces the thrilling 1984 supernatural horror directed by Jeffrey Obrow and Stephen Carpenter. [S]

programme.title: The Power

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
